text: Doc Rivers is an American professional basketball coach and former player. He has coached for the Orlando Magic, Boston Celtics, Los Angeles Clippers, and the Philadelphia 76ers. As a player, he played for the Atlanta Hawks, Los Angeles Clippers, New York Knicks, and the San Antonio Spurs. On May 16, 2023, the 76ers fired Rivers. ==References== ==Other websites== *NBA profile Category:1961 births Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Clippers players Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:New York Knicks players Category:San Antonio Spurs players Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Doc Rivers
